name: Forever and Always: A taste of the End
name_original: Forever and Always: A taste of the End
description:
With an original story, an ATB Battle System, a Materia-like Magic system, and some original music composed by me, Forever and Always is a game inspired by the dreams of one single developer. Follow Akira, a senior in high school with a story you won't soon forget!

(This is a demo. The full game is currently in development. Release date TBD. Game could be canceled or postponed at any given moment. )
